Description:
Work in designing and control of electrical machines and gadgets within the organization.
Analyzing the company's requirements and preparing the technical report to purchase relevant equipment.
Writing reports and compiling data regarding existing and potential electrical engineering projects and studies.
Gauge the troubleshooting activities in the organization and offer productive solutions to rectify any shortcomings.
Collaborate with the assigned project managers and contractors to design and maintain technically safe electrical systems.
Assess the company's existing infrastructure and suggest relevant electrical gadgets and detailed cost analysis.Skills
Skills:
Proven expertise as an electrical engineer.
Strong organizational and communication skills.
Understanding of electrical engineering codes and safety standards.
Good command of electrical engineering software to provide the best possible output.
Familiar and well versed with the International and local codes and standards.
Formal technical education in the Electrical Engineering sector from an accredited institute.
